name: get_matches_on_a_specific_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fifa_2022_schedule_and_stats.
Tool description: Get the latest FIFA World Cup Schedule and Stats 
API description: Parameters:
1.  date - Date to query the matches
2. utc_offset - Change the utc offset of the date to suit your timezone.

Returns the matches on the specified date and timezone.
Works for both historical, live, and future dates.
Match data consists of date, time, home team, away team, and many more, see the example response for an example.

date.description: The date for which to query the matches, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

utc_offset.description: The UTC offset to cater to the required timezone. Default is 8. Must be between -12 to 14.
